Author: Quesokinesis
Text: Hey. As a landlord, she's seen worse. She just has to stay on top of potential house issues. You wouldn't believe the shit people do because they just don't care.  Accidents happen. Symptoms of illness aren't always pretty like they are in the movies. You aren't disgusting, only human. Just send that apology and clean it up when you can, and it'll be okay. Promise.
